_comment: Sample JSON for bulk updating Unified Catalog terms

required_fields.term_id: The GUID of the term to update

optional_fields.name: New term name (replaces existing)
optional_fields.status: New status: Draft, Published, or Archived
optional_fields.parent_id: Parent term GUID for hierarchical relationships (replaces existing)
optional_fields.owner_ids: Array of owner Entra IDs (replaces all existing)
optional_fields.add_acronyms: Array of acronyms to add (preserves existing)
optional_fields.add_owner_ids: Array of owner IDs to add (preserves existing)

updates.name: Updated Term Name
updates.description: This is an updated description with full details
This term keeps its name but gets new description and parent
